alert.note: Alert for Northern Oneida (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Binghamton (South Central New York and Northeastern Pennsylvania)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued January 10 at 3:31PM EST until January 11 at 6:00PM EST by NWS Binghamton
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 6 PM EST THURSDAY... * WHAT...Lake effect snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 4 to 6 inches with the highest amounts in the Florence, Ava, and Boonville areas a sharp cutoff to an inch or so just to the south. Winds gusting as high as 35 mph. * WHERE...Northern Oneida county. * WHEN...Until 6 PM EST Thursday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. The hazardous conditions could impact the morning or evening commute. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... Numerous lake effect snow showers through the evening and into the overnight.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
